IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE ACCESS TO THE HEALTH CARE DELIVERY SYSTEM AND ONGOING PRIMARY HEALTH CARE SERVICES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF CARING HEALTH CENTER IS TO WORK WITHIN THE COMMUNITY TO PROMOTE HEALTH, TO CARE FOR THE ILL, TO COMFORT THE SICK, AND TO BRING THE HIGHEST LEVEL OF HEALTH CARE TO THOSE WHO ARE CHALLENGED BY SOCIO-ECONOMIC, LINGUISTIC, AND CULTURAL BARRIERS.
IRS990.Desc: MEDICAL PROGRAM - THE MEDICAL SERVICES OF CARING HEALTH CENTER PROVIDE ACCESS TO AND CONTINUING PRIMARY AND PREVENTIVE HEALTH CARE SERVICES, ADULT AND PEDIATRIC, TO THE PEOPLE OF SPRINGFIELD AND SURROUNDING COMMUNITIES REGARDLESS OF THEIR ABILITY TO PAY FOR THESE SERVICES. DURING THE FISCAL YEAR 2018, 15,463 PATIENTS WERE SERVED WITH A TOTAL OF 45,833 MEDICAL VISITS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PHARMACY SERVICES - THE HEALTH CENTER OPERATES AN ON SITE PHARMACY AND CONTRACTS WITH COMMERCIAL PHARMACIES TO PROVIDE HRSA 340 B AS WELL AS RETAIL PHARMACEUTICALS FOR OUR PATIENTS. THE PHARMACY PROGRAM ALSO PROVIDES MEDICATION THERAPY MANAGEMENT AND WORKS WITH OUR MEDICAL PROVIDERS TO PRESCRIBE THE MOST APPROPRIATE PHARMACEUTICALS FOR OUR PATIENTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: DENTAL/ORAL HEALTH PROGRAM - THE ORAL HEALTH SERVICES OF CARING HEALTH CENTER PROVIDE ACCESS TO AND CONTINUING PRIMARY AND PREVENTIVE DENTAL CARE SERVICES, ADULT AND PEDIATRIC, TO THE PEOPLE OF SPRINGFIELD AND SURROUNDING COMMUNITIES REGARDLESS OF THEIR ABILITY TO PAY FOR THESE SERVICES. DURING THE FISCAL YEAR 2018, 6,326 PATIENTS WERE SERVED WITH A TOTAL OF 15,770 DENTAL VISITS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: OTHER INCLUDING THE WIC PROGRAM - THE WIC PROGRAM OF CARING HEALTH CENTER PROVIDED NUTRITIONAL SEVICES, HEALTH EDUCATION AND OTHER SERVICES TO 6,447 RECIPIENTS IN 2018. WIC REVENUES AND EXPENSES INCLUDED $1,699,841 IN DIRECT CONSUMER AID VOUCHERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AT JUNE 30, 2018. THE ORGANIZATION'S FEDERAL AND STATE TAX RETURNS PRIOR TO FISCAL YEAR 2015 ARE CLOSED AND MANAGEMENT CONTINUALLY EVALUATES EXPIRING STATUTES OF LIMITATIONS, AUDITS, PROPOSED SETTLEMENTS, CHANGES IN TAX LAW AND NEW AUTHORITATIVE RULINGS. THE ORGANIZATION WILL RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSOCIATED WITH UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS PART OF THE INCOME TAX PROVISION AND INCLUDES ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES WITH THE RELATED TAX LIABILITY IN THE CONSOLIDATED STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION.
PROVISION FOR UNCOLLECTIBLE ACCOUNTS -101,146. RELATED PARTY REVENUE 881,333.
THE FAIR VALUE OF THE FOOD VOUCHERS IS RECEIVED BY THE HEALTH CENTER FROM THE STATE ANNUALLY. RECEIPIENTS ARE SCREENED FOR ELIGIBILITY AT THE WIC OFFICE.
THE AMOUNT IN COLUMN B REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS VIA MAIL WITH A BOARD PACKAGE. THE BOARD MEMBERS REVIEW THE 990 AND PROVIDE FEEDBACK AT THEIR DISCRETION BEFORE THE RETURN IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY REQUIRES THAT THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS, PRESIDENT/CEO, MANAGEMENT TEAM, LEADERSHIP TEAM AND PROVIDERS, REVIEW ANNUALLY THE DISCLOSURE OF ALL INTERESTS THAT COULD POSE A CONFLICT TO THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION FOR THE ORGANIZATION'S CEO IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BY COMPARING SALARY DATA WITH OTHER COMMUNITY HEALTH CENTERS LOCATED IN MASSACHUSETTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE ON FILE WITH THE COMMONWEALTH OF MASSACHUSETTS. THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLCY ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS A COMMITTEE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AS WELL AS THE SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.

THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT REQUIRED TO FILE A SCHEDULE H AND IS LICENSED IN THE STATE OF MASSACHUSETTS AS A CLINIC. SINCE IT DOES NOT MEET THE DEFINITION OF A HOSPITAL UNDER THE REQUIREMENTS OF SCHEDULE H, THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT REQUIRED TO FILE SUCH SCHEDULE.

DirectControllingEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: CARING HEALTH CENTER REALTY MANAGER INC
